meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Richard Koehler Lanier Heyburn Charbel Barakat Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7892.

td.p: Richard Koehler, a data scientist from Wilmington, Delaware
Lanier Heyburn, a neuroscientist from Bethesda, Maryland
Charbel Barakat, an attorney from Tampa, Florida (whose 1-day cash winnings total $30,700)

tr.td: 3-LETTER WORDS
(Alex: That sounds easy, doesn't it?)
(Alex: Careful with this one...)
BLAME CANADA
CAR TALK
MEANWHILE...
IT'S "NATIONAL"
TV FROM THE NEXT ROOM
(Alex: Tell us what show is just starting when you hear the opening lines from that show.)

tr.td: Charbel

13-LETTER PHRASES

BOOKS ABOUT BOOKS
OLYMPIANS FROM COUNTRIES THAT NO LONGER EXIST
U.S. NATIONAL LABORATORIES
THAT WAS SOME CHRISTMAS!
YOU WON'T BELIEVE WHAT I GOT!
